useCase.name: Content Strategy Planning

preconditions.precondition: Content Designer needs to explore existing content types.

useCase.trigger: Content Designer initiates the content strategy planning process.

mainSequence.step: Content Designer explores existing content types.
Content Designer requests content guidelines and editorial plan from Documentation.
Content Designer requests the Project Team's participation in strategy meetings.
Content Designer participates and contributes in the Content Strategy Meeting.
Content Designer formulates recommendations with Recommendations.
Team updates CMS based on recommendations.
